attributes.action: Change the structure of the minimum wage so that young people are paid equally compared to people over 21, young people often do exactly the same job as older people but are paid much less in accordance with the age ranges for the minimum wage this is age discrimination!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people are currently only required by law to be paid just over £3.31 p/h however people over 21 doing exactly the same job are paid £5.52, this is not fair and goes against all age discrimination laws that the government have introduced

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
